# attention: structure and naming are part of the implementation process and can and will be changed without further notice

# name; amount; type; trigger based on type (once: day as dd.mm.yyyy; weekly: day as dd; monthly: day as dd; yearly: day as dd.mm)
current state; 2000; once; 19.08.2019

salary; 1666; monthly; 21
rent; -666; monthly; 01

christmas money; 100; 24.12
birthday; 100; 1970-10-10
